Module ChristmasDraw
Package ac.uk.gold

Class ChristmasDraw

java.lang.Object
ac.uk.gold.ChristmasDraw
public class ChristmasDraw
extends java.lang.Object
ChristmasDraw class generates draws of couples to exchange Christmas presents for this and next year. Families are not drawn to buy presents to each other and this year's couples are excluded for next year.
Version:
1.0
Author:
mpeev001

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ChristmasDraw​(int n)
    Default constructor creates a new instance of ChristmasDraw for n number of couples

    • coupleInDraw

      public static boolean coupleInDraw​(java.lang.String[] drawingMembers, java.lang.String[] drawnMembers, java.lang.String[][] draw, int memberId0, int memberId1)
      Checks whether a member has already drawn a member from a couple in this year's draw
      Parameters:
      drawingMembers - the remaining drawing members
      drawnMembers - the remaining members to be drawn
      draw - the year's draw
      memberId0 - the drawing member ID
      memberId1 - the drawn member ID
      Returns:
      true if member with ID memberId0 has drawn a member from the couple of member with ID memberId1 in the specified draw
